author: curcuru
msg: Update convenience batch files to use new build.xml to run tests;
also update threads.bat to use threads. properties in new build.xml way

author: curcuru
msg: Update comments and help/usage text; now passes JAVA_OPTS along to the JVM

msg: Update for new minitest/smoketest targets; clean up property names
so as not to conflict with java/build.xml

author: curcuru
msg: Use CanonicalPath/AbsolutePath to ensure writeResultsStatus will
work even when using mixed-up directory separators
(i.e. this now works when logFile=foo/bar.xml on Windows)
